name: Replicate Prediction 最小
description: replicate API 呼び出しの最小例

files.template:
const res = await fetch('https://api.replicate.com/v1/predictions', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.REPLICATE_API_TOKEN}`,'Content-Type':'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ version: '{{model}}', input: { prompt: 'hello' } }) });
console.log(await res.json());
